data.name: Nvwa
data.detailed_description:
Nvwa is a Sci-Fi Strategy Game. In which you can explore an unknown galaxy, discover alien civilization relic and incredible giants, and make creatures to help you terraform the planets.

Control your rover to find mistery

You can control your ship Nvwa and some rover to find mistery on the planets. History of planet, alien civilization, giant creatures, mutated genes which can help you create more, anything in planet exploration you can imagine can be found in Nvwa.

Terraform Planets

Terraforming the planets is your goal. You don't have much resource, but you have a biologic lab and dozens of genes. With these genes, you can create hunderds of creatures. Some can resist cold or hot envirionment, some can move very fast, some are hard to die, some are easy to birth. Tons of creatures are waiting for you!

Build ecosystem for creatures

None of us can live alone, neither the creatures you create. You should build an ecosystem to make them support each other. But the weak system cannot suffer any accidents in the unknown planet. Changing weathers, extreme environments, even the creatures themselves are the enemy of ecosystem. Use your wisdom to keep the ecosystem, or you will lose your creatures.
